00013 #ifndef _WX_XML2_H_
00014 #define _WX_XML2_H_

00016 // optimization for GCC
00017 #if defined(__GNUG__) && !defined(__APPLE__)
00018 #pragma interface "xml2.h"
00019 #endif
00020 
00021 // wxWidgets headers
00022 #include "wx/string.h"
00023 #include "wx/object.h"
00024 #include "wx/wfstream.h"
00025 
00026 
00027 // When using mingw, we must define the LIBXML_STATIC symbol, otherwise
00028 // we will have problems when linking about the "xmlFree" function.
00029 #if defined(__GNUG__) && defined(__WXMSW__)
00030         #define LIBXML_STATIC
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 // Libxml2 headers: these classes wraps only libxml2 elements. You cannot
00034 // use them without libxml2 !!!!!
00035 //
00036 // To add libxml2 to your project:
00037 //   1) install libxml2 library binaries or compile them
00038 //      (you can find all the info at http://xmlsoft.org)
00039 //   2) add the include and library paths to the compiler
00040 //   3) links your progrma with the 'libxml2.lib' 
00041 //      (and 'iconv.lib' under Win32)
00042 #include <libxml/xmlmemory.h>
00043 #include <libxml/parser.h>
00044 
00045

00051 #ifdef WXXMLISDLL
00052         // if building DLL, then WX*XML*DLLEXPORT=WXDLLEXPORT...
00053         #define WXXMLDLLEXPORT          WXDLLEXPORT
00054 #else
00055         // ...otherwise 
00056         #define WXXMLDLLEXPORT          /* expand to nothing */
00057 #endif
00058 
00059 
00071 #define wxCHECK_NULL_POINTERS(x, y)             \
00072         if (x == NULL && y == NULL)                     \
00073                 return TRUE;                                    \
00074         if ((x == NULL && y != NULL) ||         \
00075                 (x != NULL && y == NULL))               \
00076                 return FALSE;
00077 
00081 #if wxUSE_UNICODE
00082 
00083         // we must use the data() function of the wxCharBuffer which is returned
00084         // by wxString::mb_str
00085         #define WX2XML(str)             ((xmlChar *)(str.mb_str(wxConvUTF8).data()))
00086 #else
00087 
00088         // wxString::mb_str will return an array of char*
00089         #define WX2XML(str)             ((xmlChar *)(str.mb_str(wxConvUTF8)))
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 
00097 #define XML2WX(str)             (wxString((const char *)str, wxConvUTF8))

00120 enum wxXml2NodeType
00121 {
00122     // note: values are synchronized with xmlElementType from libxml2 2.5.x
00123         //       
00124 
00134     wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE =                1,
00135 
00137     wxXML_TEXT_NODE =                   3,
00138 
00143         wxXML_CDATA_SECTION_NODE =      4,
00144 
00150         wxXML_ENTITY_REF_NODE =         5,
00151 
00157         wxXML_PI_NODE =                         7,
00158 
00160     wxXML_COMMENT_NODE =                8,
00161 
00165     wxXML_DOCUMENT_NODE =               9,
00166     wxXML_HTML_DOCUMENT_NODE =  13,             
00167 
00168 
00172         wxXML_DTD_NODE =                        14,
00173 
00177     wxXML_ELEMENT_DECL = 15,
00178 
00182     wxXML_ATTRIBUTE_DECL = 16,
00183 
00187     wxXML_ENTITY_DECL = 17,
00188 
00189 
00193     wxXML_NAMESPACE_DECL = 18
00194 
00195         // I don't even know when these one are used... sorry
00196     //wxXML_XINCLUDE_START = 19,
00197     //wxXML_XINCLUDE_END = 20
00198 };

00200 
00204 typedef struct tagXml2BaseNode {
00205 
00206     void           *_private;   /* application data */
00207     xmlElementType   type;      /* type number, must be second ! */
00208     const xmlChar   *name;      /* the name of the node, or the entity */
00209     struct tagXml2BaseNode *children;   /* parent->childs link */
00210     struct tagXml2BaseNode *last;       /* last child link */
00211     struct tagXml2BaseNode *parent;     /* child->parent link */
00212     struct tagXml2BaseNode *next;       /* next sibling link  */
00213     struct tagXml2BaseNode *prev;       /* previous sibling link  */
00214     struct _xmlDoc  *doc;       /* the containing document */
00215 
00216 } wxXml2BaseNodeObj;
00217

00252         virtual ~wxXml2() {}
00253

00257                 { xmlInitMemory(); xmlInitParser(); }
00258 
00262         static void Cleanup() 
00263                 { xmlCleanupParser(); }
00264                 
00267         static wxString GetLibxml2Version()
00268                 { return wxT(LIBXML_DOTTED_VERSION); }
00269                 
00272         static void TestLibxml2Version()
00273                 { LIBXML_TEST_VERSION; }

00276         static xmlGlobalState *GetGlobalState()
00277                 { return xmlGetGlobalState(); }
00278 
00281         static void SetIndentMode(bool benable = TRUE, int indentstep = 4);
00282

00296 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2Wrapper : public wxObject
00297 {
00298         DECLARE_ABSTRACT_CLASS(wxXml2Wrapper)
00299 
00300 protected:
00301 
00305         virtual void Destroy() = 0;
00306 
00311         virtual void SetAsEmpty() = 0;
00312 
00315         /*virtual void Copy(const wxXml2Wrapper &tocopy) = 0;*/
00316 
00318         virtual int &GetPrivate() const = 0;    
00319 
00320 protected:              // reference counting utilities
00321 
00471 
00472         void ResetRefCount()
00473                 { if (IsNonEmpty()) GetPrivate() = 0; }
00474 
00475         void IncRefCount()
00476                 { if (IsNonEmpty()) GetPrivate()++; }
00477 
00478         void DecRefCount()
00479                 { if (IsNonEmpty()) GetPrivate()--; }
00480 
00481         int GetRefCount() const
00482                 { if (IsNonEmpty()) return (int)(GetPrivate()); else return 0; }
00483 
00486         void UnwrappingOld()
00487                 { DestroyIfUnlinked(); }
00488 
00491         void JustWrappedNew()
00492                 { IncRefCount(); }
00493 
00494 public:
00495 
00497         wxXml2Wrapper() {}
00498 
00503         virtual ~wxXml2Wrapper() {}
00504 
00505 
00507         virtual bool IsUnlinked() const = 0;
00508 
00510         virtual bool IsNonEmpty() const = 0;
00511 
00513         virtual void DestroyIfUnlinked();
00514 };

00522 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2Property : public wxXml2Wrapper
00523 {
00524         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(wxXml2Property)
00525 
00526         
00527         xmlAttr *m_attr;
00528 
00529 protected:
00530 
00531         void Destroy() {
00532                 if (m_attr) xmlRemoveProp(m_attr);
00533                 SetAsEmpty();
00534         }
00535 
00536         void SetAsEmpty()
00537                 { m_attr = NULL; }
00538 
00539         void Copy(const wxXml2Property &prop)
00540                 { UnwrappingOld(); m_attr = prop.m_attr; JustWrappedNew(); }
00541 
00542         int &GetPrivate() const
00543                 { return (int &)(m_attr->_private); }
00544 
00545 public:
00546 
00548         wxXml2Property() : m_attr(NULL) {}
00549 
00551     wxXml2Property(const wxString &name, 
00552                                         const wxString &value,
00553                                         wxXml2Node &owner = wxXml2EmptyNode) : m_attr(NULL)
00554                 { Create(name, value, owner); }
00555 
00557         wxXml2Property(xmlAttr *pattr) : m_attr(pattr) 
00558                 { JustWrappedNew(); }
00559 
00561         wxXml2Property(const wxXml2Property &prop) : m_attr(NULL)
00562                 { Copy(prop); }
00563 
00565         virtual ~wxXml2Property() { DestroyIfUnlinked(); }
00566 
00567 
00568 public:         // operators
00569 
00572         bool operator==(const wxXml2Property &p) const;
00573         
00575         bool operator!=(const wxXml2Property &p) const          { return !(*this == p); }
00576 
00578         wxXml2Property &operator=(const wxXml2Property &p)
00579                 { Copy(p); return *this; }
00580 
00581 public:         // miscellaneous
00582 
00584         void Create(const wxString &name, 
00585                                 const wxString &value,
00586                                 wxXml2Node &owner = wxXml2EmptyNode);
00587     
00589         bool IsUnlinked() const;
00590 
00592         bool IsNonEmpty() const
00593                 { return m_attr != NULL; }
00594 
00595 
00596 public:         // getters
00597 
00598     wxString GetName() const
00599                 { if (m_attr) return XML2WX(m_attr->name); return wxEmptyString; }
00600     wxString GetValue() const
00601                 { if (m_attr->children) return XML2WX(m_attr->children->content); return wxEmptyString; }
00602 
00603     wxXml2Property GetNext() const
00604                 { if (m_attr) return wxXml2Property(m_attr->next); return wxXml2EmptyProperty; }
00605         wxXml2Property GetPrevious() const
00606                 { if (m_attr) return wxXml2Property(m_attr->prev); return wxXml2EmptyProperty; }
00607 
00608         wxXml2Node GetOwner() const;    // cannot be implemented here: wxXml2Node not defined yet
00609 
00611         xmlAttr *GetObj() const
00612                 { return m_attr; }
00613         
00614 
00615 public:         // setters    
00616 
00617     void SetValue(const wxString &value);
00618     void SetName(const wxString &name);
00619 
00620     void SetNext(wxXml2Property &next);
00621         void SetPrevious(wxXml2Property &prev);
00622 
00624         void SetOwner(wxXml2Node &owner);
00625 };

00644 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2Namespace : public wxXml2Wrapper
00645 {
00646         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(wxXml2Namespace)
00647 
00648         
00649         xmlNs *m_ns;
00650 
00655         xmlNode *m_owner;
00656 
00657 protected:
00658 
00659         void Destroy() {
00660                 if (m_ns) xmlFreeNs(m_ns);
00661                 SetAsEmpty();
00662         }
00663 
00664         void SetAsEmpty()
00665                 { m_ns = NULL; }
00666 
00667         void Copy(const wxXml2Namespace &ns) {
00668                 UnwrappingOld();
00669                 m_ns = ns.m_ns;
00670                 m_owner = ns.m_owner;
00671                 JustWrappedNew();
00672         }
00673 
00674         int &GetPrivate() const
00675                 { return (int &)(m_ns->_private); }
00676 
00677 public:
00678 
00680         wxXml2Namespace() : m_ns(NULL), m_owner(NULL) {}
00681 
00685     wxXml2Namespace(const wxString &prefix, const wxString &uri,
00686                                         wxXml2Node &owner = wxXml2EmptyNode) : m_ns(NULL), m_owner(NULL)
00687                 { Create(prefix, uri, owner); }
00688 
00690         wxXml2Namespace(xmlNs *ns, wxXml2Node &owner);
00691 
00693         wxXml2Namespace(const wxXml2Namespace &ns) : m_ns(NULL), m_owner(NULL)
00694                 { Copy(ns); }
00695 
00698     virtual ~wxXml2Namespace() { DestroyIfUnlinked(); }
00699 
00700 
00701 public:         // operators
00702 
00703         bool operator==(const wxXml2Namespace &ns) const;
00704         bool operator!=(const wxXml2Namespace &p) const         { return !(*this == p); }
00705         
00706         wxXml2Namespace &operator=(const wxXml2Namespace &n)
00707                 { Copy(n); return *this; }
00708 
00709 public:         // miscellaneous
00710 
00712         void Create(const wxString &prefix, const wxString &uri, wxXml2Node &owner);
00713         
00718         bool IsUnlinked() const
00719                 { return (m_owner == NULL) || (m_ns == NULL); }
00720 
00722         bool IsNonEmpty() const
00723                 { return m_ns != NULL; }
00724 
00725 
00726 public:         // getters
00727     
00728         wxString GetPrefix() const
00729                 { if (m_ns) return XML2WX(m_ns->prefix); return wxEmptyString; }
00730     wxString GetURI() const
00731                 { if (m_ns) return XML2WX(m_ns->href); return wxEmptyString; }  
00732 
00734         xmlNs *GetObj() const
00735                 { return m_ns; }
00736         
00737 public:         // setters
00738 
00739     void SetPrefix(const wxString &p);
00740     void SetURI(const wxString &u);
00741 };

00945                 { m_obj = NULL; }

00950                 JustWrappedNew();
00951         }

00954                 { return (int &)(m_obj->_private); }

00978                 { Copy(decl); return *this; }

00981 public:         // getters
00982 
00988

00990                 { return (wxXml2NodeType)((int)m_obj->type); }
00991     wxXml2BaseNode GetParent() const
00992                 { if (m_obj) return wxXml2BaseNode(m_obj->parent); return wxXml2EmptyBaseNode; }
00993     wxXml2BaseNode GetChildren() const          
00994                 { if (m_obj) return wxXml2BaseNode(m_obj->children); return wxXml2EmptyBaseNode; }
00995     wxXml2BaseNode GetFirstChild() const        
00996                 { return GetChildren(); }
00997     wxXml2BaseNode GetNext() const              
00998                 { if (m_obj) return wxXml2BaseNode(m_obj->next); return wxXml2EmptyBaseNode; }
00999         wxXml2BaseNode GetPrevious() const      
01000                 { if (m_obj) return wxXml2BaseNode(m_obj->prev); return wxXml2EmptyBaseNode; }
01001 
01002         wxXml2BaseNodeObj *GetObj() const
01003                 { return m_obj; }
01004 
01006 
01007 
01008 public:         // setters

01016                 { m_obj->type = (xmlElementType)((int)type); }

01020         void SetPrevious(const wxXml2BaseNode &prev);

01033 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2Node : public wxXml2BaseNode
01034 {
01035         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(wxXml2Node)
01036 
01037 protected:
01038 
01043         void Build(const wxXml2NodeType type,
01044                                 wxXml2Node &parent,
01045                                 wxXml2Document &document = wxXml2EmptyDoc, 
01046                                 wxXml2Namespace &ns = wxXml2EmptyNamespace,
01047                                 const wxString &name = wxEmptyString, 
01048                                 const wxString &content = wxEmptyString,
01049                                 wxXml2Property &props = wxXml2EmptyProperty, 
01050                                 wxXml2Node &next = wxXml2EmptyNode,
01051                                 wxXml2Node &previous = wxXml2EmptyNode,
01052                                 wxXml2Node &children = wxXml2EmptyNode);
01053 
01055         void Destroy() {
01056                 xmlUnlinkNode((xmlNode *)m_obj);
01057                 xmlFreeNode((xmlNode *)m_obj);
01058                 SetAsEmpty();
01059         }
01060 
01061 
01062 public:
01063 
01066         wxXml2Node() {
01067                 // before this node can be used it must be constructed through
01068                 // Create****() functions. See below.
01069                 m_obj = NULL;
01070         }
01071 
01077     wxXml2Node(wxXml2Document &doc,
01078                                 const wxString &name = wxEmptyString, 
01079                                 wxXml2Namespace &ns = wxXml2EmptyNamespace)
01080                 { CreateRoot(doc, name, ns); }
01081 
01083     wxXml2Node(wxXml2NodeType type,
01084                                 wxXml2Node &parent,
01085                                 const wxString &name, 
01086                                 const wxString &content = wxEmptyString,
01087                                 wxXml2Namespace &ns = wxXml2EmptyNamespace)
01088                 { CreateChild(type, parent, name, content, ns); }
01089 
01092     wxXml2Node(wxXml2NodeType type, wxXml2Document &doc,
01093                                 const wxString &name = wxEmptyString, 
01094                                 const wxString &content = wxEmptyString,
01095                                 wxXml2Namespace &ns = wxXml2EmptyNamespace)
01096                 { CreateTemp(type, doc, name, content, ns);     }
01097 
01100         wxXml2Node(xmlNode *node)
01101                 { m_obj = (wxXml2BaseNodeObj *)node; JustWrappedNew(); }
01102 
01104         wxXml2Node(const wxXml2Node &n)
01105                 { Copy(n); }
01106 
01108         wxXml2Node(const wxXml2BaseNode &n)
01109                 { m_obj = n.GetObj(); JustWrappedNew(); }
01110 
01111         virtual ~wxXml2Node() { DestroyIfUnlinked(); }
01112 
01113

01117         bool operator!=(const wxXml2Node &p) const                              { return !(*this == p); }
01118         
01119         wxXml2Node &operator=(const wxXml2Node &n)
01120                 { Copy(n); return *this; }
01121
